Title: Moscow Mule
Plot: Red gets pressured to smuggle drugs through her kitchen; Larry publishes an article about Piper in the "New York Times;" two babies come into the world.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Danielle Brooks, Dominic Colon, Cory Fernandez, Joel Marsh Garland, Annie Golden, Selenis Leyva, Taryn Manning, Matt Peters, Elizabeth Rodriguez, Nick Sandow, Samira Wiley
